description: Women's Plus Size & Supersize Gothic Style Witch, Vampiress, or Dominatrix Halloween Costume Dress. This listing is for the dress only. The gothic dress is absolutely astounding. It is a solid black crush velvet (which is actually a washable poly blend!), with long lacy black bell sleeves. It's nice & long, very sexy & low cut, with a lace up chest. You must measure yourself to place your order accurately. Please look at our size chart in the product description for the following: Bust(Chest), Hips and Length measurements. Available in plus & supersizes from 0x to 9x! Appx 50/52" Standard Length, appx 55/56" Tall Length. This style is very flattering! It is machine washable, and travels great! Wig not included in this listing.
